name: Plug and Prey
description:
An alien attack is imminent, and someone borrowed the power cables for the other 5 defense turrets! It's up to you to protect the colony!

NOTICE:

Please set your screen resolution to 1024 x 768

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Grab

Shift - Dash

Credits:

Created by Cec3

Score by Adderly Cannon

Sprites by Cec3 and Adderly Cannon

Citrink palette by Inkpendude used

Fall 2022 Respawn Game Jam
